Class AppointmentsController

java.lang.Object
Scheduler.AppointmentsController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AppointmentsController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Class to control all UI on the appointments scene

      get index of selected item of the tableview once clicked
      Parameters:
      ID - int value of appointment ID
      toWhichCollection - string value representing how the appointments table view is currently filtered
      Returns:
      int value of the current index within table view

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      FXML Override; This method is called by the FXMLLoader when initialization is complete. Handles all scene control action events and form data control btnClearForm The lambda expression btnClearForm.setOnAction(... was used because it it only needed to be called during after an action had taken place and had a very simple job to do. call 1 method to clear the form and change a couple of button options. Makes for very concise and readable code. btnReports The lambda expression btnReports.setOnAction(... was used because its purpose was to only change the scene once clicked, and that is functional and atomic. Makes it very concise and readable.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - URL location of the FXML file that was given to the FXMLLoader
      resourceBundle - ResourceBundle that was given to the FXMLLoader

    • initialize

      void initialize()
      FXML This method is called by the FXMLLoader when initialization is complete
